title: 820-00431-a imac 21 late 2014
message:
hello everybody,
i got this logic board. it doesn't turn on. i've tested the power supply and it works, Can someone please provide me the schematic and the board view, because i founded a short on 5v.

thank you

biagio

title: 820-00431-a imac 21 late 2014
message: Usually the short is on USB section, seems no schematic available, also here is not the place to ask for such material (schematic and boardview), use google.....

title: 820-00431-a imac 21 late 2014
message: thank you. I'm sorry if i have been inappropriate.

title: 820-00431-a imac 21 late 2014
message:
Schematic not available, nor boardview.
You must compare with other iMac schemtics which use the same chips.
Post exact value of the short; ohm scale to ground.
Do you have short on 5V coil, or beyond a Power MOSFET?
You may inject voltage there, depending of the short value...
